instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00165, Chimes and shuts down
threads.message:
Originally board hard short on ppbus at C7314. Replaced to remove short.
now board without SSD 90% of the time boots and shows no hdd icon. 10% just won't boot.
with SSD, sometimes chime with fan spin and dies. 

tried with external USB bootable. fan spins and dies before apple logo.

threads.title: 820-00165, Chimes and shuts down
threads.message: Disconnect internal SSD and boot from USB macOS; still turns off?

threads.title: 820-00165, Chimes and shuts down
threads.message: Yes, i disconnected the internal SSD and let it boot from HDD and it still turns off

threads.title: 820-00165, Chimes and shuts down
threads.message: Try starting in SMC bypass and diagnostic mode.

threads.title: 820-00165, Chimes and shuts down
threads.message: no issues getting into diagnostic mode without SSD plugged in. no luck with SSD plugged in and SMC bypass as well

threads.title: 820-00165, Chimes and shuts down
threads.message:
Try to clean ME.
If you can't do that, find clean ME BIOS for test; some files already uploaded on the forum.

threads.title: 820-00165, Chimes and shuts down
threads.message: so update on this unit. today it decided to boot. ran cpu stress test and no issue... made no changes since last update. *scratching head*
